name: Free Client Sharing
tooltip: With the Client Sharing feature, you can share with your clients without paying for extra users

name: Custom Domains
tooltip: Bring your own root or subdomain e.g. yoursite.com or www.yoursite.com

name: Test Domains
tooltip: A generated *.cloudvent.net domain you can use for testing

name: Hosting
tooltip: Host your site on CloudCannon's supercharged infrastructure

name: Storage Providers
tooltip: Synchornise your site with a GitHub/Bitbucket repo or Dropbox

name: White Label
tooltip: Remove all CloudCannon branding and add your own logo when sharing to clients

name: Increased Build Time Limit
tooltip: Remove the Jekyll build time limit. This limit is only hit on very large sites.

name: Jekyll Plugins
tooltip: Run custom ruby code on your site

name: Geolocation
tooltip: Display different content based on where the user is located

name: Password
tooltip: Restrict public access to a site using a password

name: User Accounts
tooltip: Restrict public access to a site using emails and passwords

name: SAML
tooltip: Restrict public access to a site using SAML authenticaiton
